Class PodcastView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
PodcastView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Observer
public class PodcastView
extends javafx.application.Application
implements java.util.Observer
Author:
Dyllon Enos, Andrew Logan, Trong Nguyen, and Dane Norville

  • Constructor Details

    • PodcastView

      public PodcastView()

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage inStage) throws java.lang.Exception
      This method will be used to start the GUI view of the podcast
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      inStage - : This is the primaryStage that is used to draw graphics on.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - throws suitable exception

    • setStage

      private void setStage()
      This method will be used to set all the button to 3 main gridPane on the primaryStage and fill the background of for the Scene.

    • setSideGrid

      private void setSideGrid()
      This method will be called to set all the button and image to the leftGrid. Buttons would be "All Podcasts" and "All Episodes".

    • showPodcasts

      private void showPodcasts()
      This method will be used to show the second stage when the users click on the button "All Podcasts". In this second stage, all the podcasts which have been added will be shown and the users can play them.

    • showPodcastEpisodes

      private void showPodcastEpisodes​(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane apCenterGrid, java.lang.String specificName)
      This function will be used to show all the episode within a Podcast. When the users click on any Podcasts in the stage, all the episodes will be shown.
      Parameters:
      apCenterGrid - : This is the gridPane we use to show the podcasts/episodes.
      specificName - : This is the name of the podcast that the users just click on.

    • showEpisodes

      private void showEpisodes​(java.lang.String decision)
      This function will be used all the episodes which had been added to the podcasts. When the users click on the button "All Episodes" on the main stage, all the episodes will be shown.
      Parameters:
      decision - : A string represents for the decision of the users

    • changePlayStatus

      private void changePlayStatus()
      This method will be called when the users stop or play any episode. If they stop a song then the variable to keep track will become 0, otherwise, it will be 1.

    • makeMenu

      private void makeMenu()
      This method is used to create the menu on the top left of the stage. The users can exit or create new playlist from the menu.

    • setRecentPlay

      private void setRecentPlay()
      This method will be used to set all the buttons for the recent played episodes. The users can play those episodes by clicking on those buttons.

    • setSuggestAlbum

      public void setSuggestAlbum​(javafx.scene.effect.DropShadow ds)
      This method will be used to show all the albums of the days which are the suggestion for the users.
      Parameters:
      ds - : This is the DropShadow effect for the button.

    • setSongOfDays

      public void setSongOfDays​(javafx.scene.effect.DropShadow ds)
      This method will be used to show all the episodes of the days which are the suggestion for the users.
      Parameters:
      ds - : This is the DropShadow effect for the button.

    • setBottomGrid

      public void setBottomGrid()
      This method will be used to set all the buttons such as play, next song, previous song, ... at the bottom of the grid. The title of the current song will also be shown on the left of the bottom grid.

    • changedShuffle

      private void changedShuffle()
      This will changed the shuffle flag which represent for the demand of the users. If they want to do shuffle then the flag will be 1 and 0 if not.

    • changedReplay

      private void changedReplay()
      This will changed the replay flag which represent for the demand of the users. If they want to do replay then the flag will be 1 and 0 if not.

    • getSpawnView

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView getSpawnView​(java.lang.String character)
      This method will be used to load the url links to the image and then return the suitable ImageView based on the link.
      Parameters:
      character - : This is the name of the logo/image
      Returns:
      the suitable ImageView based on the link

    • update

      public void update​(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      This will be used to update the GUI view based on the all the changes from the model and controller.
      Specified by:
      update in interface java.util.Observer

    • updateRecents

      private void updateRecents​(java.lang.String episodeName)
      This function will be used to update all the recent episodes that the users just play. All the buttons will be filled and the users can play those episodes again by clicking on those buttons.
      Parameters:
      episodeName - : This is the name of the episode that was played
